attributes.action: upgrade the pitifully low level of redundancy payments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become apparent in the last 10 years that redundancy payments have dropped so much in real terms that it has now become easy for lazy employers to use redundancy as the first option.As part of the EEC employers are sacking staff in U.K. because it's much cheaper to dispose of staff than in the rest of the EEC,this situation must be stopped immediately.
